Text:
This is garbage. Don't waste your 20 MB of space downloading this. This is a non standard compiler. Hard to use. If you want a good compiler that is highly optimizing (not free), use:

http://microchip.htsoft.com/

If you want a really good compiler that's fully free and open source, use:

http://sdcc.sourceforge.net/
SDCC is not as optimising as hi-tech c compiler but it's free and it never fails. Good to get started with.
